structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts

law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 18. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] A creditor who does not present his claim for allowance in the manner herein provided shall be barred from recovering the same; but if new assets of the deceased come to the executor or administrator after the decree of distribution, the claim may be proved, allowed and paid as provided in this chapter for contingent claims.
